comment: I just ordered the ingredients for this based on the Zymurgy recipe.  How did yours turn out? Any recommendations before I undertake a 5 gallon brew of this?  Thanks!

Yes...I put some heat on my strawberries to ensure nothing funky.  I have some serious protein haze (taste is great) from slight development of the pectin.  I think I would take a chance and put frozen berries in my primary and pour cooled wort over top to hit pitching temp.
